CookiesModal.text1: At RMG we use cookies to help ensure that our website and services are able to function properly. These cookies are necessary and so are set automatically.
CookiesModal.text2: We would also like to use some cookies to:
CookiesModal.item1: improve our website based on how you use it
CookiesModal.text3: These cookies are optional. If you'd like to accept all optional cookies, select 'Accept all cookies'. If you'd like to reject them, select 'Reject'.

FontsSection.text1: The fonts below used in your projects were loaded from our server instead of your device.
FontsSection.text2: This may cause unnecessary network traffic and slowness especially if your connection is unstable.
FontsSection.text3: You can download and install these open source and free fonts to get a better experience.
FontsSection.safari: This is not applicable to Safari users. ☹️
